details.description: Log in and send your VAT Return online and get help with lost username, password or account activation codes
details.more_information:
To use this service you must have: 

+ a VAT number
+ an HMRC online account - sometimes known as a 'Government Gateway account'

You usually get these when you [register for VAT](/vat-returns/send-your-return "Get a VAT number and or HMRC online account").

*[HMRC]: HM Revenue & Customs
*[VAT]: Value Added Tax
details.introduction: Log in to your HM Revenue & Customs (HMRC) online account and send your VAT Return or get help with lost usernames, passwords and account activation codes.

details.description: Includes online returns, rates, charging and record keeping
Includes VAT, debt and inheritance tax
Send your VAT Returns online - return boxes, deadlines, penalties and surcharges, corrections, bad debts and final VAT Returns
How to pay your VAT - online, by Bacs or CHAPS, bank giro, Direct Debit, CHAPS, phone banking or by cheque at a bank or building society
